demonicAttack.name: Demonic Attack
demonicAttack.description: Gives <damage> to the enemy. Increases liarmeter for <amount> points.

gambler.name: Gambler
gambler.description: Gives random damage between <damageMin> - <damageMax> to the enemy. Increases liarmeter for <amount> points.

gambler.name: Payback
gambler.description: Deals higher damage as liarmeter gets higher. Max <damage> damage can be dealt.

holyShield.name: Holy Shield
holyShield.description: Gain <shield> amount of shield and decrease liarmeter by <amount> points.

drugs.name: Drugs
drugs.description: Do. Not. Use. It. Too. Much.

greedy.name: Greedy
greedy.description: Doubles the damage given this turn, but increases liarmeter by <amount> points.

conscience.name: Conscience
conscience.description: Doubles the damage taken this turn, but decreases liarmeter by <amount> points.

faith.name: Faith
faith.description: Gives 1 mana and decreases liarmeter by <amount> points.

takeRisk.name: Take Risk
takeRisk.description: Gain <amount> extra mana this turn, but start with <amount> less mana next turn.
